text: Almar Heggen (25 May 1933 - 22 October 2014) was a Norwegian opera singer. He was born in Norddal. He made his debut at Det Norske Operaselskap in 1957. From 1960 to 1969 he was assigned at German stages, including Deutsche Oper Berlin, Theater Freiburg, Hessisches Staatstheater Wiesbaden and Staatstheater Nürnberg. From 1969 to 1986 he was assigned with Den Norske Opera. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from Møre og Romsdal Category:Norwegian opera singers Category:Norwegian expatriates in Germany
title: Almar Heggen
